 */import BrowserDatabase from"/home/marketihor/scandipwa/packages/scandipwa/src/util/BrowserDatabase";/**
 *
 * @type {string}
 */export var CUR_CURRENCY='current_currency';/**
 *
 * @type {number}
 */export var ONE_HOUR=3600;/**
 *
 * @param {Any} currency
 * @returns {void}
 * @namespace Util/Currency/setCurrency
 */export var setCurrency=middleware(function(currency){BrowserDatabase.setItem(currency,CUR_CURRENCY,ONE_HOUR);},"Util/Currency/setCurrency\n");/**
 *
 * @returns {String} currency
 * @namespace Util/Currency/getCurrency
 */export var getCurrency=middleware(function(){var currency=BrowserDatabase.getItem(CUR_CURRENCY);return typeof currency==='string'?currency:'';},"Util/Currency/getCurrency\n");
